parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description:
The maximum number of entries to return in a request. You can use this parameter and NextToken to implement paging.

>  A maximum of 100 entries can be returned in a request.

parameters.name: NamePrefix
parameters.description: The prefix of the names of the event buses that you want to query.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: If you configure Limit and excess return values exist, this parameter is returned. You can use this parameter and Limit to implement paging.
